description.translate: No one ever knew where he came from or where he went, but no one ever forgot him.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Aïeul du ciel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Personne ne sut jamais d'où il vint\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ni où il alla, mais personne ne l'oublia.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7No one ever knew where he came from or\"}","{\"text\":\"§7where he went, but no one ever forgot him.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HAS§c-1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
